text: avara pyeki ondu gumpinavaru (granthavannoduvaga, tavu oduttiruvudu) granthada bhagavendu nim'mannu nambisalikkagi tam'ma naligeyannu tirucuttare. Nijavagi adu granthada bhagavagiruvudilla. Adu allahana kadeyinda bandudendu avaru heluttare. Nijavagi adu allahana kadeyinda bandiruvudilla. Avaru (satyavannu) tilidirutta, allahana kuritu sullu heluttare
